channel.title: Just updated and now mouse pointer moves in and out of guest freely
channel.description:
I finally did the update to 11. Thank you for the bigger resolution, much better to work now!
I also noticed that now the mouse pointer moves freely in and out of the host. Before I had to press the host key to do that. Is that expeted beahviour and are there any risks related to it?

item.title: Just updated and now mouse pointer moves in and out of guest freely
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

the problem which arises from this could be the accidental usage of a wrong (unsafe) browser. You may (if you’re using VBox) activate or deactivate the feature of “mouse integration” by pressing Control and I simultaneously and selecting or deselecting “Disable Mouse Integration”.

Have a nice day,

Ego
